headline: SLB Awarded Integrated Services Contract for All Petrobras’ Offshore Fields in Brazil
summary: HOUSTON, December 11, 2024--Global energy technology company SLB (NYSE: SLB) today announced that it has been awarded, after a competitive tender, a new contract by Petrobras (NYSE: PBR) for integrated services across all offshore fields operated by Petrobras in Brazil. SLB will oversee the construction of more than 100 deepwater wells, utilizing advanced drilling, cementing and drilling fluids technologies on up to nine ultra-deepwater rigs.

headline: Pioneer Disciplined Value Fund Q3 2024 Performance And Market Commentary
summary: Pioneer Disciplined Value focuses on mispriced quality, sustainable US large-cap companies trading at attractive valuations with the goal of maximizing risk-adjusted returns.
